title: Architect Responds to RFI
description: An architect needs to respond to an RFI about a wall dimension discrepancy.

tasks.description: Retrieve the pending RFI regarding the wall dimension in Room 101.
Provide the official answer: 'The correct dimension for the west wall of Room 101 is 12.5 feet as shown on the structural drawings (S-5). Please disregard the dimension on A-2.'
tasks.expected_outcome: A clear and definitive answer is provided for the RFI.

tasks.description: Update the RFI status to 'Closed' and notify the project team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The RFI is closed and the project team is notified of the clarification.
